body.description: Take care of your skin with NIVEA MEN Breathable Body Lotion. This daily body lotion for dry skin is specially formulated for men who want to stay active and feel fresh throughout the day. This dye free and paraben free lotion is enriched with Shea Butter, Vitamin C and Vitamin E. With a fresh scent, this dry skin body lotion provides 48 hours of long-lasting moisture with no sticky feel and allows sweat to evaporate 3x faster than NIVEA MEN Maximum Hydration Body Lotion. Featuring breathable skin technology, this NIVEA body lotion for men works with microgel technology in place of typical emulsifiers found in lotions to allow for fast absorption. A daily moisturizing body lotion is a key part of a skin care routine and pairs well with NIVEA MEN Body Wash. To use NIVEA MEN lotion, pump lotion and smooth over body; apply this body moisturizer daily after showering for best results.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: New NIVEA MEN Breathable Lotion Uses our breakthrough breathable technology to deliver the deep nourishing moisture your skin needs without the sticky-feel of other lotion. The game-changing formula provides long lasting moisture and evaporates sweat 3x* faster, so you can stay on the move.

First to Market NIVEA's Revolutionary Breathable Skin Technology Features microgel that replaces the emulsifier found in typical lotions. This reduces the thickness of the formula and allows for fast absorption without the heavy barrier

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best lotion for men
reviews.reviewText: Smells great as my girlfriend even where's it, it goes on and drys fast, no oil after feel. Doesn't stain shirts or leave marks, stops you from looking dry and ashy. I recommend it for the guy who likes to smell nice and have smooth skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing at what it does
reviews.reviewText: This lotion is really good at keeping my skin soft for the entire day. It dries pretty fast (within a minute or 2) and smells great.If you're looking for a scented lotion (for scent alone) I wouldn't go for this, as the smell is great but it doesn't last more than a half hour or so.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing gel type moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: This isn't the typical nivea lotion your used to. It's my go-to hot weather/post gym moisturizers. Has a gell like property that absorbs in seconds and really does last for a good day on your skin. It does have a strong smell that dissipates after a while, remember it does say "mens" on the bottle so it is a masculine-ish scent; my wife still uses it sometimes. Works great on the hands especially if you using your hands outdoors or car work, sports.. etc, you won't have slippage because it absorbs almost entirely.One of the few lotions/moisturizers on the market like this, and I hope they never discontinue it..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's funny how they have a note on this bottle of lotion that says it'll make you sweat less. I'd love to see proof of that. It smalls great but I'm taking a star off for the steep price and strange claim. I don't think there is any anti-perspirant in it, so I don't see how it would possibly make you sweat less.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: this lotion is always out of stock in the stores nearby. just like it says on the bottle, it is a breathable lotion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Men’s body cream
reviews.reviewText: As advertised this product isn’t greasy and doesn’t have that after slippery feeling. Effective once on for quite awhile.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lo mejor para piel seca

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The scent is so strong it almost hurts!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this after I ran out of Nivea's female version of this lotion. These "breathable" lotions are the only kind lotion i'm willing to tolerate cause I can't stand how most lotions make my skin and clothes feel all gross and greasy.This lotion isn't ultra moisturizing but it definitely gets the job done. For reference, I live in a dry climate and I take hot showers so my skin gets dry enough that I get visible flakes if I don't moisturize (no amount of exfoliation makes these flakes go away so I guess you could say my skin gets pretty dry). This lotion is adequate for that. It sinks into your skin faster than regular lotion and more importantly: it doesn't leave any gross residue! I don't like how it takes a little bit longer to sink in than the other one, but I would say the main difference between the male and female version is the lack of soy and the scent.When I ordered this I assumed it would have less of a scent than the tropical women's version, but unfortunately, it has a really strong perfume to it. Oddly, it smells more perfumish than cologne-ish to me (I don't particularly like it but neither do I hate it). What bothers me is that it's strong enough that it sometimes feels like it hurts my nose, so if strong scents irritate you I would steer clear.Luckily, I've found that the scent doesn't linger, but I will definitely be going back to the female version (regardless of the soy). The scent of that one lingers, but at least it actually smells good!
